Subject: No logs for file uploads over browsers - KASTO
Description:
During the POC, the prospect ran into an issue where the Content Aware logs are not reaching the server.
They tried uploading a pdf file on both Edge and Chrome web browsers, on wetransfer.com and dlptest.com, on Windows.
The Content Aware policy is set to Report Only, all web browsers are selected, PDF file type is selected, policy is applied to all users and computers. DPI is enabled, and there is a DPI allowlist included in the policy, but it does not include the domains/websites used for testing.
The files were successfully transferred through wetransfer.com; however, on dlptest.com, there was the "Server responded with 0 code." error displayed near the end of the upload process (screenshot below). No logs were received for either of these events by the server.
Solution_Comment__c: The customer is using a proxy over port 8077.
Account_Name__c: KEURO Besitz GmbH & Co. EDV-Dienstleistungs KG
